text: Testing animal and human sera by indirect immunofluorescence assay against four rickettsia antigens (R. rickettsii, R. parkeri,  @@ R. felis @@ , and R. bellii), some opossum, dog, horse, and human sera reacted to R. rickettsii with titers at least four-fold higher than to the other three rickettsial antigens. text: Testing animal and human sera by indirect immunofluorescence assay against four rickettsia antigens (R. rickettsii, R. parkeri, R. felis, and  @@ R. bellii @@ ), some opossum, dog, horse, and human sera reacted to R. rickettsii with titers at least four-fold higher than to the other three rickettsial antigens. This study investigated rickettsial infection in animals, humans, ticks, and fleas collected in five  << areas >>  of the state of São Paulo.

text: New one-week, low-dose triple therapy for the treatment of duodenal ulcer with  @@ Helicobacter @@  pylori infection.
